title: Data Scientist
description:
Problem Solving: created a machine learning model to analyze and learn from a dataset and then generate accurate predictions, using critical thinking to overcome challenges
Presenting: delivered clear presentation of my AI model results and methods used, effectively communicating concepts to the team
Communication: actively participated in various meetings ranging from welfare to project debriefs with coworkers, understanding how clear communication is done in the workplace
Learning: Opportunity to meet each person of the team and their work, explaining to me their methods and reasoning

title: Manual Tester
description:
Reporting: after conducting testing and identifying bugs, I need to make detailed and clear documentation to effectively report my findings to the client
Problem Solving: each job varies meaning new challenges will be present, needing to adapt strategies and develop new methods
Persistence: bugs might not be found after long periods of testing, requiring maintaining a high level of focus during extended periods of testing
Attention to Detail: subtle visual bugs can be hard to spot, finding these bugs ensures the user experience is seamless
